text: St. Francis Xavier's Church is a parish of the Roman Catholic Church in Pizhala, Kerala, in the Archdiocese of Verapoly. == History == === First Church Construction === === Second Church Construction === Fr. Joseph Moonjappilly was the vicar during this period === Third Church Construction === Fr.
